name: Shiva Bike Runner Adventure
description:
slide, jump and swipe to avoid a variety of obstacles.

How many Heart can you pick up?
How far you can go?

Run as fast as you can if you want to survive. But the the Clown is smart and has planted many traps on your way that you have to jump over them. There are also trap in this road that can kill you if you hit them!

Download and play Shiva Bike Runner Adventure and enjoy the games..
